experiences.title: Associate Software Engineer (Full Stack Flutter)
experiences.subtitle: CBSOL
workDescription: Developing cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter with GetX and Riverpod for effective state management.
Following Clean Architecture principles to build scalable and maintainable codebases.
Integrating RESTful APIs and ensuring smooth data flow between frontend and backend systems.
Building and maintaining backend services using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB for robust data handling.
Collaborating with UI/UX designers, QA engineers, and fellow developers to deliver high-quality features on time.
Actively contributing to code reviews, performance optimization, and debugging to maintain code quality.

experiences.title: Associate Software Engineer & Internship Coordinator (Flutter)
experiences.subtitle: Tiers Limited
workDescription: Developed and maintained cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter for Android and iOS platforms.
Integrated Firebase services including authentication, real-time database, Firestore, and cloud storage.
Followed Clean Architecture principles to build scalable, maintainable, and testable codebases.
Utilized state management tools like GetX, and Provider for structured and reactive UI development.
Collaborated closely with backend teams and designers to ensure seamless API integration and smooth user experience.
Led performance optimization efforts, implemented efficient UI rendering and minimized app load times.
Delivered client-focused features on strict timelines while ensuring code quality through regular reviews.
Managed internship programs as Internship Training Coordinator — mentoring interns, assigning projects, and monitoring their growth and performance.
